glsa.title: Xerces-C++: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: An error in Xerces-C++ allows for a Denial of Service via malicious XML schema files.

background.p: Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of C++.

description.p: Frank Rast reported that the XML parser in Xerces-C++ does not correctly handle an XML schema definition with a large maxOccurs value, which triggers excessive memory consumption during the validation of an XML file.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to validate an XML file using a specially crafted XML schema file, leading to a Denial of Service (stack consumption and crash).

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
